title: NSG and Port Details
description: Quick View of NSG info and port details
author: Natalia Balus

portColor.getColor: ({state, type, uplinkconnections}) => { if (!state) return '#B5B5B5'; switch(state) { case 'DOWN': return '#D9070A'; case 'UP': return type === 'Network' || type === 'LTE' ? Array.isArray(uplinkconnections) && uplinkconnections[0] && uplinkconnections[0].auxiliaryLink ? '#FF9C45' : '#5A83DE' : '#62AC00'; default: return '#B5B5B5'}}

legend.getLabel: ({state, type, uplinkconnections}) => { if (!state) return 'Port Not Configured'; switch(state) { case 'DOWN': return 'Port Down'; case 'UP': return type === 'Network' || type === 'LTE' ? Array.isArray(uplinkconnections) && uplinkconnections[0] && uplinkconnections[0].auxiliaryLink ? 'Aux Uplink' : 'Uplink Up' : 'Access Port Up'; default: return 'Port Not Configured'}}
